hero_section.headline: Heal Your Heart. Strengthen Your Connections. Bloom in Nature.
hero_section.subheadline: I’m Dana—relationship counselor, Psychodrama & Espere®️ guide, nature-ritual creator—here to help you transform relationships and reclaim your true voice.

about_dana_section.introduction: I’m Dana Dragomirescu—a compassionate relationship counselor, certified Psychodrama practitioner and Espere®️ facilitator, mother of two, and creator of nature‑aligned rituals and women’s circles. Deeply rooted in earth‑wise practices, I support people like you to heal communication wounds, build soulful connections, and live fully in harmony with your inner nature.

individual_counseling.headline: One‑on‑One Relationship & Healing Sessions
benefits: Release emotional blockages and somatic stress through Psychodrama & Espere®️ tools
Gain clarity and confidence in your most meaningful relationships
Develop practical communication skills that nurture intimacy and respect

women_circles.headline: Moon‑aligned Women’s Circles & Nature Rituals
benefits: Tap into collective wisdom and embodied creativity each new moon
Create living art with plants, crystals, mandalas to anchor internal transformation
Feel seen, held, and celebrated in a sisterhood rooted in sacred space

group_facilitation.headline: Psychodrama & Espere®️ Group Facilitation
benefits: Experience breakthrough insights through role-play and group dynamics
Learn powerful communication hygiene that shifts family & professional relationships
Build emotional resilience and community-support through shared practice

testimonials_social_proof.text: “Dana’s warmth and clear guidance helped me speak my truth nonviolently—and I feel closer to everyone in my life.”
“Her Psychodrama and Espere®️ methods changed how I relate—it’s like my relationships now have their own healthy life.”
“In the women’s circle I created art with flowers and crystals—and found a space where I feel fully seen.”
“Dana’s Akashic readings gave me soul‑level clarity and a profound sense of sovereignty.”
“The group facilitation felt deeply safe, supportive, and transformational—tools I use every day.”

call_to_action_general: Curious how one session can deepen your relationships? Let’s talk.
Join our next New Moon Circle—secure your spot now.
Book a conversation to explore group facilitation for your team or community.
website_copy.meta_description: Dana Dragomirescu offers compassionate relationship counseling, Psychodrama & Espere®️ facilitation, women’s circles, and nature‑rituals in Romania. Heal, connect, grow.
